title: [FEATURE] Add "net6.0-windows" support and not dependent "SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.macOS"
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/69663231/188142829-2ab73fa6-8048-432b-a8a2-1f86f4b66129.png)

We do not need "SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.macOS" on Windows, so please add "net6.0-windows" target support and just use native assets of win32.
